items.title: Ears
items.text: Complete 1.9 skin backport with additional character customization features
items.author: Unascribed

items.title: Fragile Mode
items.text: Half heart of health, modified UI; days survived tracker on death screen
items.author: Logan

items.title: Click Mining Fix
items.text: Removes the delay between breaking blocks when holding your mouse down
items.author: AtomBlade

items.title: BetterLight
items.text: Ports the smooth lighting engine out of the Beta 1.2_02 Minecraft version
items.author: Logan

items.title: LilypadQA Creative Menu
items.text: Ports the creative block menu from LilypadQA to NSSS
items.author: icanttellyou

items.title: 256 Block Build Limit
items.text: Extends the world height of NSSS to 256 blocks
items.author: jonkadelic

items.title: No Version Text
items.text: Removes the version text in the corner of the screen
items.author: Vita

items.title: More Fuels
items.text: Supports multiple fuel types, primarily wood-based materials
items.author: Tara

items.title: oCd Pack
items.text: Port of the FVDisco oCd texture pack
items.author: gamerman1202

items.title: Faithful NSSS Pack
items.text: Port of the Vattic Faithful texture pack by Vita
items.author: Vita

items.title: Spring Pack
items.text: Every day is Spring with this texture pack by Vita
items.author: Vita

items.title: Beta Foliage
items.text: Ports the Minecraft Beta foliage color palette
items.author: Logan
